title: Bug 2940 - Export Zip: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor when exporting zip in Bug 2940. Currently, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown during this process.
OB: During the exporting process, it takes approximately 30 seconds for the checked state of the table to update, but no busy cursor is shown.
EB: During the exporting process, a busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the system is working and updating the checked state of the table.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the export zip feature. 
2. Select multiple items to export. 
3. Observe that the checked state of the table takes a long time to update. 
4. Notice that no busy cursor is shown during the updating process.
